overview: Mike Looney is a partner at Ontogeny Ventures, a New York City-based Technology Incubator that focuses on niche market Internet startups. He has a background in software & Internet technology startups. He is the Founder of the digital PR Agency Adelopod Group and has worked with a number of early-stage companies, including BA Insight, Stone Magazine, and MyCollab. Mike graduated from the University of Michigan with a BA in history and English.
